question: Joe has 35 hectares of melon field. There are 8 melons per hectare. Joe can harvest his melons every 12 months. How many melons can Joe harvest within a year?
answer:
Joe has 8*35= <<8*35=280>>280 melons on his field.
Joe can harvest his melons 12 / 12 = <<12/12=1>>1 times per year
Therefore Joe can harvest 280*1 = <<280*1=280>>280 melons per year.
#### 280
